mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN UNIV_CAMPUS IN ('제2캠퍼스', '제3캠퍼스', '국제캠퍼스', '서울캠퍼스') THEN UNIV_NAME || '[' || UNIV_CAMPUS || ']' ELSE UNIV_NAME END AS UNIV_NAME , COALESCE(CC1.CC_NAME, UNIV_TYPE) AS UNIV_TYPE , COALESCE(CC2.CC_NAME, UNIV_GUBUN) AS UNIV_GUBUN , UNIV_URL , UNIV_REGION , UNIV_ADDR FROM UNIVERSITY U LEFT JOIN COM_CODE CC1 ON U.UNIV_TYPE = CC1.CC_ID LEFT JOIN COM_CODE CC2 ON U.UNIV_GUBUN = CC2.CC_ID
